page.title: 09The Village Fete in Lavant 2
page.content: One of the stalls at Lavant Fete sold home made crafts.These were pottery houses with a little light in them and some little pottery cottages.There were also candles with your star sign on,and wooden key racks.The people on the stalls were very pleased with their home made crafts.The prices of these may have been expensive but they were worth it.There was also a pancake stall. You could smell the onions frying and all the other fillings_lemon and sugar,golden syrup,jam and savoury fillings.The pancakes must have been very tasty because there was an enormous crowd queuing up waiting to be served.The price of the pancakes was 25p each which was very reasonable.
